4317830.name: Rite of Red Snow
4317830.description:
PLATFORM, PUZZLE AND SURVIVE IN AN IMMERSIVE WORLD

In this 3D puzzle platformer, you will explore a beautiful, vibrant, and highly stylized Stone Age world with an exciting narrative set thousands of years in the past /= in your own pace =/. Nonetheless you will need to overcome the dark, harsh, and unforgiving nature of the unknown environment by solving puzzles, climbing deadly cliffs, and trying to stay alive. As you near the top, you will encounter the remains of another Stone Age tribe and see breathtaking sceneries full of flora, fauna, and mountain ranges.

THE TRIAL PUT UPON YOU

You play as Firi, who has been sent by your tribe to fulfill a sacred duty. You shall surmount the great mountain and appease the evil spirits. You venture forward, climbing the dangerous and cruel mountain. However, you are not the first to be sent to appease the evil spirits...

UNRAVEL THE SECRETS / UNCOVER THE TRUTH

As you stray from the path, you travel through the region of past deeds, slowly uncovering its secrets. On this adventurous detour, you must not only face evil spirits, the truth, but also overcome new challenges.

In the end, only you decide what kind of person you are - and how far you’ll go to survive/prevail.

UNIQUE DIRECTIONAL COMBAT

You fend of evil spirits in a four dimensional combat system. Reading your enemies' movements and timing your actions are key to victory, continuing your path, and fulfilling your duty to your tribe.

Download the Rite of Red Snow demo to experience the perfect combination of adventure, action, platforming, and puzzling.
